Name: Aegis Retaliator
Description:
Manufacturer: Aegis Dynamics
Focus: Heavy Gunship

This civilian refit of the Retaliator updates the military ship's chassis with unladen space able to be fitted with various modules to suit your needs.
DescriptionText: This civilian refit of the Retaliator updates the military ship's chassis with unladen space able to be fitted with various modules to suit your needs.
